showerReviews.reviewText:
Urine stained shower is absolutely disgusting.
I keep being told they clean it "everyday".
I come for a shower everyday and it has NOT been cleaned at all. Not even once. $75/month to shower in the urine stained shower. Yeesh.

I really like the gym and equipment but man.... taking a shower afterward in the same enclosure as toilets is pretty rough. Nothing like taking a shower in the same steamy air other people just pooped in to feel clean. Also, there are too …

… folks in those days. Nowadays it's almost entirely filled with dirty a d inconciderate homeless people, and Mexicans who don't speak English and leave the showers with different bugs as if they never shower for days. But the place holds a …

… Deep swim diving pool... And lap pool.... Full showers and dressing areas.... Just wear your flipflops... don't shower barefoot in shower locker rooms...Or you could end up with a wart on your foot in the general shower area like I did.... …

Very nice place.
I went here with a shower voucher and showered.
I've been to 4 or 5 pools in the last 6 months. They are the only one that doesn't let you take a shower.
Was just there to grab a quick shower , at $8 was that bad

showerReviews.reviewText: … Why: is not clean. The floor has not been vacuumed for months. Showers have mold  growing in them and several showers will be out of order due to missing shower heads or handles to turn the water on. …

… , the hot tub has broken tiles and water damage and makes you smell like chlorine for two days even if you shower immediately on getting out, the aerobics room floor needs redone badly, the weight room floor has tiles bowing/coming up, …

… shows tremendous signs of age, especially in the locker room, visible signs of mold and mildew in the shower and hot tub area management seems to be very disconnected from membership and staff as there’s an undertone of …

… .   The men’s locker room is worse then the bathroom is a Motel 6.   They have one $10 blow dryer in it the half the showers either dorm work or are falling apart.  The bath towels are so small they barely fit around my 30” waist.    The …

Hours are awful. Locker rooms need to be cleaned more often, shower heads need to be fixed (falling off). Always at least 1 cardio machine not working. Over crowded after the closing of union station location.
